ves_testimonial_testimonial.name: Angie Joe
ves_testimonial_testimonial.testimonial: This plugin has all features that I could imagine for showing testimonials. And also guys you've got so quick and clear support - I thought that I didn't type the whole question yet and already receive a proper answer.

ves_testimonial_testimonial.name: Renax

ves_testimonial_testimonial.name: Lawrence
ves_testimonial_testimonial.testimonial: I have purchase this extension for current project. It is working perfectly. The menu is easy to install and modify by drag & drop. On the front end, the navigation menu quickly lead customer to specific product. One again a great product.
ves_testimonial_testimonial.title: Excellent Plugin
